name: Sketch Commisions
description:
Commission some custom art! Want a sweet picture of your favourite character.

£10-A4 Black & White Character Sketch

£15-A4 Colour Character Sketch

£20-A4 Black & White Group Character Sketch (e.g X-men, Avengers)

£25-A4 Colour Group Character Sketch

£30-A3 All Previous Variations

See examples of work at http://aecomics.tumblr.com/ and http://www.abandonearthcomics.com/Comic/

Before Purchasing, send a message using the contact page found on the right with a brief idea of what you want the commission to  be.

name: Custom Greeting Cards
description:
Want to give a loved one something personal and unique for their next birthday? A custom designed card is a great way to show you care. 

High street shops will never have something as personal as something designed by you. For a low price they can have something unique, fun, and something that they will cherish a lot longer than a store bought card. 

Once you've placed your order, use the contact form to send a brief description of what you want to appear on the card. I will send you an image of the card before sending so it can approved before completion.

The Variety Pack works in the same way, give me an idea of what you would like the cards to be like and I will produce them to your satisfaction. They can be all individual or a couple of different ideas repeated, it is up to you.

If you desire the card to be sent directly to the recipient, please include a sending address in your order description. 

All cards are A5 size, if you require something larger, use the contact form and we can discuss pricing.

name: Star Dancer
description: Inspired by the cosmic character of comics in the 1960's, Star Dancer represents the infinite stretch of space and the very little amount we know about the universe.

name: I Dream In Neon
description: In the early days of video games, a huge degree of abstraction and imagination was needed to transform the primitive shapes on screen into the daring adventures we all desired. This A3 print represents that ideology with it's bright stripes of neon cast against a calculated darkness.
